messages.title: Why I am backing Faisal Rashid
messages.content: I have known Faisal for 12 years as a councillor and former Mayor of Warrington. He is truly passionate about our town, and has been an effective champion for local people. He has supported me with issues such as overcrowding in Victoria Park, fighting to keep our National Health Service out of private hands, and improving education to give every child a good start in life. Councillor Faisal Rashid will support jobs and skills for young people, support public service workers, and defend our NHS against Tory backdoor privatization.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend our NHS against Tory backdoor privatization, support public service workers.
Support jobs and skills for young people.

issues.education: Improving education to give every child a good start in life.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a well-respected champion for local people. My priorities will be the NHS, education, jobs, and skills for young people.

endorsements.endorsement: I have known Faisal for 12 years as a councillor and former Mayor of Warrington. He is truly passionate about our town, and has been an effective champion for local people.

quotes.text: We must vote Labour to safeguard our rights and our future.
Don't accept David Mowat's broken promises.
